title: Darius bug report
body: Whenever i am playing dunkmaster darius and use abilities on an enemy, the sword cursor that pop up when u hover over an enemy stays as my cursor until i left click. and i cant ult an enemy champion when its there. also when i right click to attack an enemy with the cursor on my champion has to stand on them instead of attacking from his original attack range. please fix

replies.body: What type of cast are you using? Quick Cast? Quick Cast with indicators?
I'm glad I'm not the only one with this issue.. costed we 2 provisional games and a couple of ranked. Please fix riot

Im having the same issue, when you attack someone everytime you put the cursor over darius, you can see a sword and its like when you put the cursor over another champ, like the image (the dot is where the cursor was). The thing is that when you have an enemy close to you, you cant click basic attack him, because you have the sword and your champ (darius) is selected. I hope this gets fixed x_x
its only with dunkmaster from what ive played
